roleset.name: get to end of valid time period
roleset.note: EXPIRE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'expire' based on sentences in financial subcorpus; adjectival 'expired' added by Julia based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls disappearance-48.2. Comparison with 'run_out'. (from expire.01-v)
EXPIRED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from expired.01-j)

example.name: Adjectival rel: expired
example.text: The relevant county government departments passed the buck to each other , disputed over trifles , and delayed it over and over again , which caused Deka Company 's " Construction - Use Land Planning Permit " and the " Approval for the Pre-Examination on the Use of Land " issued by the Provincial Land Resources Bureau to be expired , thus causing great losses to the enterprise .
example.arg: Deka Company 's " Construction - Use Land Planning Permit " and the " Approval for the Pre-Examination on the Use of Land " issued by the Provincial Land Resources Bureau

example.name: Arg1
example.text: The cheese's expiration was evident by its fuzziness and funky smell.

roleset.name: exhale
roleset.note: EXPIRATION-N NOTES: Based on verb-exhale.01. (from expiration.02-n)

example.name: Arg1, DIR
example.text: A sneeze is a powerful expiration of air through the nasal passages.
